intro: Cliffortia esterhuyseniae, commonly known as the Esterhuysenia's cliffortia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Fabaceae and is characterized by its compact, shrub-like growth habit. The plant produces small, pea-like flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
